attributes.action: Have Hazel Blears investigated for the alleged flipping of her second home, she should be suspended until further notice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hazel Blears has allegedly 'flipped' her designation of second home three times in one year, this entitles her
to claim allowances in relation to all three properties.
Allegedly misleading the Inland revenue, which if proved correct may or may not be Fraud. And so should be investigated.
Ms Blears has admitted on TV that she claimed this money (£13,332 in capital gains tax), and is paying it back.
She has now written a cheque for this amount, brandishing it on TV, how many of us are able to write a cheque for this much?
Are MP'S exempt from the law?

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
